attributes.action: give Raef Bjayou (fired from the Apprentice) his own chat show!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Raef Bjayou, obviously the best candidate from the Apprentice and unfairly fired, should have his own chat show. As the 'spoken word is his tool', he could enlighten viewers with his accurate portrayals of life and memorable maxims.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
